text: Ordered 2 pizzas and bread sticks, waited over an hour, with the delivery times changing every so often. When I tried to call and ask what the issue was, I was immediately hung up on. Don't accept the order if you won't fulfill it, just say you won't/can't do it. I'd rather be told that, as I'm sure you would too.

text: Great staff. Amazing pizza. What's not to love?

text: Mistakenly tried this location after the horrible service I experience at there Cuyahoga Falls Location. It was just as bad, Employees smelled of Pot and eyes were bloodshot. The Food was cold and I threw up that evening. I would recommend to purchase food else where, fresh is always better.

text: Despite the negative reviews. I had ordered from them. 2xs recently and I must say both times I was very satisfied. Pizzas were hot and fresh. I did pick up at the window. I got the butter garlic crust on both pizzas. Must say my family had no complaints!

text: Friendly in person and on the phone, even the delivery people. Not sure why I like this one so much but I've been to pizza huts in four or five countries and this one is so far the best, except for when I could read a book and get a free pan way back in the day. #bookit
